Package com.netflix.genie.agent.execution.statemachine.listeners

Class ConsoleLogListener

java.lang.Object
com.netflix.genie.agent.execution.statemachine.listeners.ConsoleLogListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
JobExecutionListener
public class ConsoleLogListener extends Object implements JobExecutionListener
Job execution listener that prints messages visible to the user in the console.
Since:
4.0.0

      Specified by:
